title: 3DPass
author: 3DPass
content: Hello guys. 3DPass community established a grant program for development of new mining tools. https://3dpass.org/distribution.html#contribution- GPU or CPU mining tools - 2 000 000 P3D- Mining pool - 2 000 000 P3DFor now we've got these tools:- Official Node and miner: https://github.com/3Dpass/3DP- Unofficial node and miner: https://github.com/easy-3dpÂ Feel free to reach me out over discord (https://discord.gg/u24WkXcwug) or here if you got interested in or have any questions.
